embed.title: Commands:
embed.description:
Trial is an Economy Bot that is urrently in Beta.
Here's some commands to get started.

fields.name: $balance/bal
fields.value: ```Shows how much balance you have in ur wallet and bank.```

fields.name: $withdraw/with
fields.value: ```Allows you to withdraw money from your bank to your wallet. Note: Money from the wallet can be robbed.```

fields.name: $deposit/dep
fields.value: ```Allows you to deposit money from your wallet to your bank. Note: Money can not be robbed from the bank.```

fields.name: $rob/r
fields.value: ```Allows you to rob money from someone's wallet. Note: money can not be robbed from the bank.```

fields.name: $send/s
fields.value: ```Allows you to send money from your wallet to someone elses wallet.```

fields.name: $slots/sl
fields.value: ```Allows you to bet money, and if you win, you will recieve double the amount.```

fields.name: $inventory/inv
fields.value: ```Shows all the items you own in ur inventory```

fields.name: $buy
fields.value: ```Allows you to buy an item from the shop```

fields.name: $sell
fields.value: ```Allows you to sell an item that you have in ure inventory.```
